name: Odd to Odd, Even to Even
name_original: Odd to Odd, Even to Even
description:
Controls: 

  1. WASD -> Move
  2. Mouse drag -> Move Camera

In this game, you are a dice that has to activate all the pressure plates by falling on them with the same color as the face of the dice that you are falling on top of.

This game was developed in 48 hours for the GMTK 2022 Game Jam, where the theme was "Roll of the Dice." By Swieqi Studios. Credits to: Jenny Muscat for the art, Christine Gafa' for the art and the music, and Sergio Moreno for the development.
